subject.name: Royal Commission into Aged Care Quality and Safety

inserted.heading: Royal Commission into Aged Care Quality and Safety

question.name: Royal Commission into Aged Care Quality and Safety

inserted.#text: 601  (13 February 2018).  Will the minister allow the commonwealth aged-care royal commission full and uninhibited access to all South Australian aged-care sites?

talker.name: The Hon. D.C. VAN HOLST PELLEKAAN

question.name: Royal Commission into Aged Care Quality and Safety

by.#text: The Hon. D.C. VAN HOLST PELLEKAAN (Stuartâ€”Minister for Energy and Mining):

inserted.#text: The Minister for Health and Wellbeing has advised:

text.inserted: The state will fully cooperate with the commonwealth commission.
